name: Tac-Toe
description:
Tac-Toe is a strategy game for two players.

Rules :
One player plays White Toe.
Other player plays Black Toe.
White Toe always goes first.
Players take turns marking the spaces in a 3×3 grid. The player who succeeds in placing three of their marks in a horizontal, vertical, or diagonal row wins the game.
If all nine squares are filled and neither player has three in a row, the game is a draw.

ControlsEscMain menuRRestart current game
